title: Cannot Install GCC 6.3.0 on Latest Spack
body:
I am trying to install GCC 6.3.0 on the latest Spack from Git on CentOS 7.3.
```

[root@harris spack]# cat /etc/redhat-release
CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core) 

[root@harris spack]# uname -a
Linux harris.pbtech 3.10.0-514.6.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Jan 18 13:06:36 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Lin
```


```
[root@harris spack]# spack compilers
==> Available compilers
-- gcc centos7-x86_64 -------------------------------------------
gcc@4.8.5

```


```
[root@harris spack]# spack --version
0.10.0
```

```
[root@harris ~]# cd /softlib/apps/EL7/spack/
[root@harris spack]# git status . && git log | head
# On branch develop
nothing to commit, working directory clean


commit a2135dff49290ed4aeb21e3b9d5192063bc3b0ed
Author: Jeffrey Salmond <js947@users.noreply.github.com>
Date:   Fri Apr 21 18:54:27 2017 +0100

    add cppcheck new version (#3935)

commit 46d0ca9d01c6d6e2a67dacf528b7cc306d5bb815
Author: Adam J. Stewart <ajstewart426@gmail.com>
Date:   Fri Apr 21 12:15:39 2017 -0500

```


```
[root@harris ~]# spack install gcc@6.3.0                                                                                                                                                                                                      
==> Installing gcc
==> mpc is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/mpc-1.0.3-umgid46twpczw3hnlkz3jgond32zf33l
==> zip is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/zip-3.0-v4kyuwbfv5bmk2tmaehtw6sfbyzxd3bu
==> isl is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/isl-0.18-l4somr6goh77xpmdb4tey7uwovhds526
==> gmp is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gmp-6.1.2-6bsovvkqwx6zscwtbvjj6egrgizbyycm
==> Installing binutils
==> flex is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/flex-2.6.3-gnt4evdwfh3mbftpulkn6q2kc3v2lq75
==> zlib is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/zlib-1.2.11-yrijbmajetpxrkyaa4uclsyw62zbhc5m
==> bison is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/bison-3.0.4-c5ytubd6ywscu36h5fjthcj7gcy6xbi7
==> gettext is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/gettext-0.19.8.1-avclmvbznh4phh2n7y75cry4u2dinrgp
==> m4 is already installed in /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/m4-1.4.18-q4wgufspmqjhpfohffdbd73atohe4ncx

==> Staging archive: /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/var/spack/stage/binutils-2.28-66ufycihw5nglnjuy4xf6hqpwrru6bx4/binutils-2.28.tar.bz2

==> Applied patch cr16.patch
==> Ran patch() for binutils
==> Building binutils [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase : 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase : 'configure'
==> Executing phase : 'build'
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Successfully installed binutils
  Fetch: 0.52s.  Build: 4m 4.53s.  Total: 4m 5.05s.
[+] /pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/gcc-4.8.5/binutils-2.28-66ufycihw5nglnjuy4xf6hqpwrru6bx4

==> Executing phase : 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase : 'configure'

==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j56'
/pbtech_mounts/softlib001/apps/EL7/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_systems/autotools.py:273, in build:
     268      def build(self, spec, prefix):
     269          """Makes the build targets specified by
     270          :py:attr:``~.AutotoolsPackage.build_targets``
     271          """
     272          with working_dir(self.build_directory):
  >> 273              inspect.getmodule(self).make(*self.build_targets)

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-6S5U7l/gcc-6.3.0/spack-build.out

```

```

checking if the linker (ld) is GNU ld... yes

make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-6S5U7l/gcc-6.3.0/spack-build'

```

Thank you greatly for the assistance.
